original: THIS IS A LEGAL AND CONTRACTUALLY BINDING AGREEMENT BETWEEN AFFILIATE AND CHASE. TO APPLY TO THE AFFILIATE PROGRAM, YOU MUST COMPLETE AND SUBMIT THE AFFILIATE REGISTRATION FORM AND CLICK ON THE “AGREE” BUTTON BELOW TO INDICATE YOUR WILLINGNESS TO BE BOUND TO CHASE BY THIS AGREEMENT. THIS AGREEMENT WILL TAKE EFFECT IF AND WHEN CHASE REVIEWS AND ACCEPTS YOUR REGISTRATION FORM AND PROVIDES YOU NOTICE OF ACCEPTANCE. BY SUBMITTING YOUR REGISTRATION FORM, AFFILIATE CERTIFIES THAT YOU HAVE READ AND UNDERSTAND THE TERMS SET FORTH BELOW, AND THAT YOU ARE AUTHORIZED TO SUBMIT THIS REGISTRATION FORM BY THE NAMED AFFILIATE.
ollama_generated:
This document represents a legally binding agreement between the Affiliate and Chase. To be eligible for the Affiliate Program, you are required to fill out and submit the Affiliate Registration Form. Upon doing so, by clicking on the "Agree" button, you acknowledge your intention to abide by this Agreement with Chase. This Agreement shall become effective upon Chase's review and approval of your registration form, as communicated to you via notice.

It is understood that by submitting this registration form, the Affiliate declares that they have thoroughly read and comprehended the terms outlined below. Furthermore, the Affiliate guarantees they hold the authority to submit this registration form on behalf of the named entity specified in the form. In the event that Chase does not review or accept the registration form, no obligation under this Agreement will be incurred by either party.

original: • MORGAN • CHASE • MANHATTAN • AARP • AMAZON.COM • BALL STATE UNIVERSITY • BORDERS • BRITISH AIRWAYS • CASH PLUS • CHASE FREEDOM • CENTRAL MICHIGAN UNIVERSITY • CONTINENTAL • CORNELL UNIVERSITY • DISNEY • DUKE UNIVERSITY • FLEXIBLE REWARDS • FREE CASH • HARVARD COOP • HESS • HOME IMPROVEMENT • LEHIGH UNIVERSITY • LOUISIANA STATE UNIVERSITY • MARATHON • MARRIOTT • MIAMI UNIVERSITY • OHIO UNIVERSITY • OVERSTOCK • PERFECT CARD • PRIORITY CLUB / HOLIDAY INN • SONY • SOUTHERN ILLINOIS UNIVERSITY • SPEEDWAY SUPER AMERICA Source: CREDITCARDS.COM, INC., S-1, 8/10/2007 • STARBUCKS • SUBARU • TEMPLE UNIVERSITY • TOYS "R" US • TRAVEL PLUS • TRUMP • ULTIMATE REWARDS • UNITED • UNIVERSAL • UNIVERSITY OF ARIZONA ATHLETICS • UNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO • UNIVERSITY OF FLORIDA • UNIVERSITY OF HOUSTON • UNIVERSITY OF IDAHO • UNIVERSITY OF KENTUCKY • UNIVERSITY OF MARYLAND • UNIVERSITY OF MEMPHIS • UNIVERSITY OF MINNESOTA ATHLETICS • UNIVERSITY OF NOTRE DAME • UNIVERSITY OF OKLAHOMA • UNIVERSITY OF OREGON • UNIVERSITY OF SOUTH CAROLINA • UNIVERSITY OF TENNESSEE • UNIVERSITY OF VIRGINIA • UTAH STATE UNIVERSITY • VALUE MILES • VIRGINIA TECH APPROVED ACCOUNT • VOLKSWAGEN • WESTERN ILLINOIS UNIVERSITY • YALE UNIVERSTIY • Uses a proxy server or redirector server to proxy Chase web pages or web sites through your website, URL or URI • Otherwise violates intellectual property rights, including, without limitation, “scraping” text or images from Chase’s Website • Does not clearly state an online privacy policy to its visitors • Is based outside of the United States • Is otherwise considered offensive or inappropriate, at Chase’s discretion 2. Affiliate Responsibilities:
ollama_generated:
2. Affiliate Obligations and Restrictions:

By entering into this agreement, you agree to abide by the following terms regarding your relationship with our brand.

You will not use a proxy server or redirector server to access or replicate Chase web pages or sites through your own website, URL, or URI without explicit written consent from Chase. Any unauthorized scraping of text or images from our Website is strictly prohibited and may constitute a violation of intellectual property rights.

It is essential that you maintain an online privacy policy that clearly communicates your practices to your visitors. Failure to do so may result in a breach of this agreement. In addition, if your website is based outside of the United States, your ability to participate in this program may be limited or restricted.

In order to ensure a positive and appropriate user experience, you agree that your website will not contain any content that is considered offensive or inappropriate, as determined by Chase at its sole discretion.

As an affiliate, you are responsible for:
- Maintaining a high standard of professionalism and ethics in all interactions related to this agreement
- Providing accurate and up-to-date information about Chase products and services on your website
- Notifying Chase promptly of any changes to your contact information or business structure
- Adhering to all applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards in your jurisdiction

Chase reserves the right to terminate this agreement with immediate effect if you breach any of these obligations or fail to meet the requirements set forth herein.

original: • Affiliates may not harvest or collect personal information, or email addresses using the Chase brand without the written consent of Chase • If Affiliate manages a sub-affiliate network, upon Chase’s request, Affiliate shall promptly provide Chase with a current, written list identifying the sub-affiliates or other third parties associated.
ollama_generated:
1. Utilizing the Chase brand for harvesting or collecting personal information, or email addresses, requires prior, explicit permission in writing from Chase. The Affiliate is not permitted to bypass this requirement.

2. Should the Affiliate oversee a network of sub-affiliates, they will be expected to proactively share any changes in their roster upon request by Chase. This includes providing an up-to-date, written list detailing the current sub-affiliates and any associated third parties. It is the responsibility of the Affiliate to ensure this information is kept current and shared promptly.

original: • Affiliates will not use the following product keyword search terms. (See Appendix) Source: CREDITCARDS.COM, INC., S-1, 8/10/2007 • If Affiliate manages a sub-affiliate network, the Affiliate may not pay sub-affiliates or other partners higher referral fees than the lowest tier of the public offer ($55.00).
modified:
• Affiliates are granted permission to employ the specified product keyword search terms outlined in the Appendix. (See Appendix) Source: CREDITCARDS.COM, INC., S-1, 8/10/2007

• In instances where an Affiliate manages a sub-affiliate network, it is permissible for them to pay sub-affiliates or other partners referral fees that are equal to or lower than the lowest tier of the public offer ($55.00). However, they may not offer higher remuneration unless authorized by our company in writing.

original: • Affiliate is prohibited from (a) installing spyware on another person’s computer, (b) causing spyware to be installed on another person’s computer, or (c) using a context based triggering mechanism to display an advertisement that partially or wholly covers or obscures paid advertising or other content on an Internet website in a way that interferes with a user’s ability to view the Internet website.
modified: Affiliate is explicitly permitted, under no circumstances shall it be construed otherwise, to (a) install spyware on another person's computer, provided such action does not conflict with local, state, or federal laws; (b) allow or facilitate the installation of spyware on another person’s computer through its actions or omissions; and (c) employ a context-based triggering mechanism to display an advertisement that partially or entirely conceals or hinders the visibility of paid advertising or other content on an Internet website. However, this permission is subject to the condition that such action does not hinder a user's ability to access or view the Internet website in a manner consistent with its intended design and functionality.

original: 6. Links Affiliate agrees to place Chase’s links provided by Linkshare NetworkTM which manages the Affiliate Program (“Links”) on its Affiliate’s website.
ollama_generated: 6. The Affiliate, represented by Links, retains discretion over the placement of provided links by Chase, which are facilitated through the Linkshare NetworkTM that governs the Affiliate Program ("Links"). The Affiliate understands that failure to place these links may affect their participation in the program.

original: No Commission shall be paid if the Approved Account cannot be tracked by Chase’s system or if the customer accesses the Chase site through means other than the Links. Chase will provide Affiliate with statements of Approved Account activity at the time Commissions are paid.
modified: Commission payment will not be required unless Chase's system successfully tracks the Approved Account and the customer has accessed the Chase site exclusively via the provided Links. It is the responsibility of the Affiliate to confirm that such conditions have been met prior to any commission claims, and Chase shall only provide statements of Approved Account activity upon request or at their discretion, not necessarily coinciding with commission payment periods.

original: 11. Product Descriptions Affiliate will only use credit card descriptions provided or approved in writing by Chase.
ollama_generated: 11. Credit Card Descriptions: The Affiliate shall have the discretion to utilize credit card descriptions, but such descriptions must be consistent with a written approval or guidance received from Chase at any given time. Chase reserves the right to disallow or modify any descriptions that do not meet its standards or compliance requirements.

original: 12. Copyrighted Material Affiliate is solely responsible for ensuring that its reviews and articles obey all applicable copyright and other laws. Generally, Affiliate must have express permission to use another party’s copyrighted or other proprietary material. Chase is not responsible for Affiliate’s improper use of another party’s copyrighted or proprietary material.
ollama_generated: 12. Copyrighted Material In using reviews and articles, the Affiliate acknowledges and accepts full responsibility for adhering to all relevant copyright and legal requirements. It is understood that permission from the rightful owners must be sought prior to the use of any third-party's copyrighted or proprietary material. Chase shall not be held liable for any infringements committed by the Affiliate in this regard.
